title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Bring on the giggles, the squeaks, and the friendly rivalry! Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents is the fast-paced family party game that pits generations head-to-head for laugh-out-loud fun. With two tailored decks—one for kids and one for adults—everyone gets a fair shot at victory. Kids get familiar, age-appropriate clue words with just two forbidden words per card, while adults tackle varied, trickier prompts. The twist stays classic: get your team to guess the word without saying the “taboo” words—slip up, and the opposing team scores (cue the squeaker!).

Why families love it:
- Kids vs. Parents format: 2 decks, 130 cards each, so every age plays at their level.
- Big replay value: 260 total cards and 1,000+ guess words keep every round fresh.
- Heart-racing rounds: One-minute timer adds excitement and keeps the game moving.
- Hilarious penalties: Includes the iconic squeaker to catch forbidden-word slip-ups.
- Easy to learn, fast to play: Perfect for game nights, parties, and holidays.

How to win:
- Team up, race the timer, give clever clues, avoid the forbidden words, and rack up the most points.

What’s in the box:
- 2 decks of cards (Kids and Adults, 130 each)
- 1 squeaker
- 1 one-minute timer

Recommended for ages 8 and up from the trusted Hasbro Gaming brand, Taboo Kids vs. Parents turns every gathering into a lively showdown where wordplay, quick thinking, and teamwork steal the spotlight. Ready, set, squeak—and may the best generation win.
